snippet: The National Golf Links of America in Southampton, N.Y., has hosted only one major tournament in nine decades, the original Walker Cup match. Now the Cup returns.
lead_paragraph: The National Golf Links of America in Southampton, N.Y., has hosted only one major tournament in nine decades, the original Walker Cup match. Now the Cup returns.

headline.main: Long Island Club Emphasizing Tradition in Role as Walker Cup Host
headline.print_headline: Long Island Club Emphasizing Tradition in Role as Walker Cup Host
